nodes.text: Tubers were a type of plant that grew in the Dune Sea of the desert planet Tatooine. They were eaten by Tatooine's native dewbacks. Tubers were also grown on Akiva and Lothal and were eaten with meat products such as prairie-fowl breasts.
Tubers were first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, which was released in 2015.
